tool_description: Evaluates the quality of completed reviews based on comprehensiveness, constructiveness, technical accuracy, and adherence to review guidelines.

review_ids.description: List of completed review identifiers to assess

assessment_criteria.description: Quality criteria to evaluate: thoroughness, clarity, constructiveness, timeliness, technical_accuracy

benchmark_reviews.description: Reference review IDs for comparison benchmarking

scoring_method.description: Method for quality scoring: automated, hybrid, comparative

error_messages: Invalid review IDs: Some provided review identifiers do not exist or are incomplete.
Invalid assessment criteria: Use combinations of [thoroughness, clarity, constructiveness, timeliness, technical_accuracy].
Invalid scoring method: Use one of [automated, hybrid, comparative].
Benchmark reviews not found: Some provided benchmark review IDs do not exist.
Too many reviews: Limit to 50 reviews for quality assessment efficiency.
usage: Provide review_ids to assess review quality. Configure assessment_criteria and scoring_method to customize evaluation. Use benchmark_reviews for comparative analysis.

quality_scores.description: Overall quality scores (0-1) for each review

criteria_scores.description: Detailed scores for each assessment criterion per review

improvement_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions for improving each review

assessment_summary.description: Summary of quality assessment results and overall recommendations
